divs: Sighting DetailsI was just leaving school, then i saw that cloudy halo around a building , then i decided to take a video and some pictures. At that time i didn���t noticed the UFO hovering around the halo. You can actually see another one at the start in the top corner. 3 years later i found this out when bored and was watching my videos, i watched it like 10 times and found even more movements, it was crazy. I took 1 video and 3 images just because of the cloudy halo. I was amazed when i found this out. It was hovering around, up and down, diagonal, side to side. Sadly, when i was filming this i didn���t noticed it so the video only lasts 31 seconds.
